thread.title: St. Peter’s Square

title: St. Peter’s Square
text:
My wife and I visited Italy on our honeymoon in 2006. We felt particularly blessed on our wedding day; four days later I felt we were again blessed by the pope himself. We spent much of the rest of that day debating whether or not we had in fact been blessed in St. Peter’s Square (2 beautiful children and many happy memories later, I know the answer). – Davor Duric
Have a favourite travel memory? Please send us a travel photo and 50 to 75 words about why it is special to you. Send high-resolution jpegs of between 500K and 6MB to Travel Memories at travel@thestar.ca . Please include your address and phone number.
